Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'What happened to Lamia was a long story.'}
{3: "But we need to go through it to explain why she ended up in The Merciful One's camp."}
{3: "So, let's begin."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory279.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "This is what you're after, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{3: "A gleaming white cube appears on Lee's fingertips—Huaxu's key, given by Roland earlier."}
{3: 'He hands Lucia the key before pointing his gun at Lamia.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Hmph... Guys with instincts are the worst.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Can't let an Ascendant get ahold of it again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "...Ascendant? Pfft, you really are pretty clueless, aren't you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What are you saying?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Hmm... I'll get nagged if I say another word. You're nowhere nearly as scary as that guy.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Try as you may, I'll get what I want eventually. And this time... you're not catching me.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lamia flicks her tongue out to taunt them before disappearing into thin air.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Eek... If this road is destroyed, I\'ll have to wait at the "end"...)'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Better not show up in front of them again. There is only one shot...)'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "Lamia was going to seize Huaxu's key from the exhausted Babylonia members, but the explosion and collapse of the facility have brought unexpected changes to Lamia's plan."}
{3: 'Lamia managed to get the thing that "he" wanted, but she finds that if she doesn\'t run, she will be buried alive with the entire facility.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory279.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Lamia gathers strength from all four legs, leaping toward the top of the ruins like a locust.'}
{3: 'A steel bar loses its hinge and swings down.'}
{3: 'Lamia is in mid-air and has nowhere to run. She is knocked sideways, slamming into the ruins on the opposite site.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory278.png'}
{3: 'The impact pushes Lamia all the way to the other side of the ruins. Meanwhile, right underneath her...'}
{3: 'Roland sits at the bottom of a crater, watching the Red Tide pouring down from the broken pipes. Beside him lies the other ashen Hetero-Creature, now completely lifeless.'}
{3: 'He picks up his broken left arm, trying to match it up with where it fractures from his shoulder, before putting it down disappointingly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "...It's over... It's all over... I'm the only one left...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'This group of Ascendants, led by Luna, is facing inevitable destruction, Lamia believes.'}
{3: 'But she refuses to go down with it.'}
{3: 'She wants to survive. She will survive, no matter what she has to do...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Dammit... I won't die here... Eeaaagghhh!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She forces herself up, clinging onto every single protrusion of the ruins.'}
{3: 'One step after another.'}
{3: 'Every step means she is closer to "survival."'}
{3: 'Every step means she is moving further away from "those people."'}
{3: 'But Lamia has to do it. Because she must live on.'}
{3: 'She sees the sun outside—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory71.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(If I ever tell Roland that I watched Miss Luna disappear and watched him die without doing anything...)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(...No! It's too scary! He's going to kill me for sure!)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Remember the Polyphage? It was a complete mess...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I couldn't find you after that...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Will he believe me? Will he?)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "...Whatever. I was lucky to survive it. You couldn't really do anything even if you were there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '...Yeah, exactly...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'What happened after? Why were you in the camp of The Merciful One?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'You seemed like you wanted to follow her.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Um, that's because...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory9.jpg'}
{3: "After Lamia left, she completed the deal. But someone didn't seem to think this way."}
{3: 'She has only been walking on the wasteland for a few days before finding out someone has been watching her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(...What's going on? I already changed my route many times, but I still feel like being watched and chased...)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia has no choice but to give up hiding or staying. She departs once again, hoping to get rid of the pursuer.'}
{3: 'And then—'}
{3: "Two shells fly past Lamia's both sides, kicking up a lot of dust from the ground. She looks back at their source and finally gets a vision of the chaser—"}
{3: "It's a black figure rapidly approaching from the sky."}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'You got "that thing." Hand it over.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'But I already gave it away...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "...Guess I'll just take it off your corpse.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Before Lamia can explain, numerous missiles are launched from the chaser's giant wings, flying toward her..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory71.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I have been chased ever since... Could not find anywhere to take a break.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Until I got near The Merciful One's camp... That black guy circled around and left. They might have some sort of agreement."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'After that... I just saw you come out of her tent...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Speaking of which, Roland, you look a lot different now... What happened?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'If you ask me... She saved me, probably.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I just bought myself a chance, taking advantage of her uninhibited and unpredictable nature.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Even so, I took a great risk trying to set up an agent. Gotta be more careful in the future.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Now there is a second chance, "we" must find Luna again.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Sigh... But where shall we go...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "...That's a problem indeed.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Even Roland doesn't have a clue... Such a rare sight.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(But if that's the case...)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Why don't we split up? That way, we will have a better chance...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(As long as I can leave Roland for a moment, I can get away...)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Actually, no.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I am just as clueless as you are. We won't get anywhere if we split up.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Both of us are equally worn out. Better not divide our strength even further.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Before Roland says "are you planning to run away," Lamia quickly replies.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "L-let's move together then!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "Lamia doesn't mind if Roland doubts her, as long as he doesn't become an enemy."}
{3: 'If she is lucky, she may find enough chips for her next deal with Murray along the way.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Guess we just have to move together for now.'}
{3: 'Instead of thinking where to go, Lamia would rather let those around her decide her direction.'}
{3: "She can then focus on how to survive. This is what she has always been doing, so the decision isn't hard to make."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory71.jpg'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "We might have lost the others, but I don't see any harm in two left-behinds sticking together.", 4: '2'}
{3: "So Roland isn't eager to dig into Lamia's hesitating and capricious response."}
{3: "It's not the time to push her away yet. After all, she makes a great scapegoat, and is an asset he can sacrifice any time."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Speaking of which, how much do you know about The Merciful One? Why were you with her?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I don't know either...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "It's just that... I sensed a power from her, not quite like Miss Luna's... But very similar...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'You wanted to find a shelter, but she turned you down?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lamia nods.'}

{3: 'Ever after what happened to Shome, Roland had been investigating The Merciful One. But every piece of information about her was ambiguous, just like her mysterious smile and unpredictable action.'}
{3: 'She seems to be always alone, with no minions or friends. Roland cannot tell if she poses a threat to Luna as an agent.'}
{3: 'Not to mention that she did save his life.'}
{3: "She gave him so much, but asked for nothing. Even when she learned that he was only using her, she wasn't upset at all. Whoever did this must be either a saint or a fool."}
{3: 'Roland does not think she is a fool, but can hardly call her a saint.'}
{3: 'What is her purpose then?'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Either way, it's not something I should worry about right now.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Perhaps she had a purpose, perhaps she didn't. But that's not important at this moment."}
{3: 'After all, he would have died long ago without her.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Let's take a rest and head out at daybreak.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "He didn't ask any more questions... Am I safe for now?"}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '...I can only keep going. There is no safe place...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory71.jpg'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I'll leave it to you to set up the guard, lassie (Miss).", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lamia wants to complain, but Roland has already lain back against the wall and entered hibernate mode.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory38.jpg'}
